en.title: Optical Lenses
en.subTitle: AI offers HOKLAS accredited lab tests and dedicated quality control resources to help ensure compliance of optical lenses with all applicable standards.
en.soloutionTitle: Eyewear Expertise – QC for Optical Lenses
en.soloutionContent:
Optical lenses are traditionally purchased by opticians and optical retailers, to be used in everyday optics, prescription sunglasses, driving glasses, custom-made reading glasses, and other types of prescription eyewear made to order. Compliance of ophthalmic lenses is paramount to the quality, performance and corrective properties of the finished eyewear.

According to European Directive 2007/47/EC (formerly 93/42/EEC), optical lenses are categorized as a medical device.

AI offers the full scope of lab tests and quality control procedures for optical lenses, including dimension, mechanical, optical, radiation, aging, and other tests. Our on-site factory inspections and HOKLAS certified testing help you ensure that your product meets the requirements of your destination market and international standards.

Dedicated Eyewear Testing Labs and Inspector Resources

AI has a staff of highly qualified inspectors and fully accredited lab facilities to provide every type of test required to ensure the quality of your optical lenses. Our eyewear lab testing reports are issued with HOKLAS and ILAC endorsement, and recognized by the British Standards Institution and SAI Global (for CE Certification), as well as by the Australian Benchmark Product Certification.

We are certified to perform tests to the ISO/IEC 17025 standard for Eyewear and Ophthalmic Products, and help you ensure compliance of your optical lenses with all applicable international and national standards, including:

  • International: ISO 14889, ISO 21986.9
  • Europe: EN ISO 14889, EN ISO 21987
  • USA: ANSI Z80.1
  • China: GB 10810 (sections 1-3), GB/T 13511
  • Australia / New Zealand: AS/NZS ISO 14889, AS/NZS ISO 21987

HOKLAS Certified Lab Testing for Optical Lenses

Our dedicated eyewear testing laboratory offers the largest available range of tests to check the chemical, geometric, and optical characteristics of your lenses against all relevant international standards, including:

  • Anti-abrasion coating, for ISO / EN ISO / AS/NZS 980-5, GB 10810.5, and ANSI Z80.1
  • Anti-reflective coating, for ISO / EN ISO / AS/NZS 8980-4, ANSI Z80.1, and GB 10810.4
  • Driving lens requirements, for ISO / EN ISO / AS/NZS 8980-3, ANZI Z80.1, and GB 10810.3
  • Flammability test, for ANSI Z80.1
  • Hard coating durability, for GB 10810.5 (enhanced abrasion resistance method)
  • Lens coating durability, for AS/NZS 2228.1
  • Lens coating stability against cosmetic or cleaning solvents (in-house methods)
  • Lens geometric size and thickness tolerances, for ISO / EN ISO / AS/NZS 8980-1, ANSI Z80.1, and GB 10810.1
  • Lens mechanical strength (minimum robustness), for ISO / EN ISO / AS/NZS 14889
  • Lens positioning, for ISO / EN ISO / AS/NZS 8980-2, ANSI Z80.2, and GB 10810.2
  • Lens resistance to ignition, for ISO / EN ISO / AS/NZS 14889
  • Lens surface quality, for ISO / EN ISO / AS/NSZ 14889, ISO / EN ISO 8980-1, ANSI Z80.1, and GB 10810.1
  • Luminous transmittance and transmittance, for ISO / EN ISO / AS/NZS 8980-3, ANSI Z80.1, and GB 10810.3
  • Mounted pair lenses, for ISO / EN ISO / AS/NZS 21987 and ANSI Z80.1
  • Multifocal and bifocal lens optical powers and tolerance, for ISO / EN ISO / AS/NZS 8980-1, GB 10810.1, and ANSI Z80.1
  • Progressive power lens optical powers and tolerance, for ISO / EN ISO / AS/NZS 8980-2, GB 10810.2, and ANSI Z80.1
  • Resistance to extreme temperatures (aging test): thermal stability, low-temp stability, etc.
  • Resistance to optical radiation (aging test, xenon 450w lamp for 25-50 hours), for ISO / EN ISO / AS/NZS 8980-2, GB 10810.2, and ANSI Z80.1
  • Resistance to UVA/UVB radiation (aging test, in-house methods)
  • Single vision lens optical powers and tolerance, for ISO / EN ISO / AS/NZS 8980-1, GB 10810.1, and ANSI Z80.1

Custom testing programs can be prepared to suit your in-house specifications and quality control procedures. Get in touch with us, and our specialists will give you an instant quote for your eyewear testing needs.

  • Fashion sunglasses
  • Ski goggles and performance eyeglasses
  • Eye and face protectors

zh.title: 光学镜片
zh.subTitle: AI 亚检提供获得 HOKLAS 认证的实验室测试和专业质量检测资源，以帮助确保光学镜片符合可适用的所有标准。
zh.soloutionTitle: 眼镜类产品检测专家 — 光学镜片的质量检测
zh.soloutionContent:
光学镜片通常都由眼镜商和光学产品零售商采购，用于日用光学产品、处方太阳镜、驾驶眼镜、定制老花镜和其他各类按处方定制的眼镜类产品。按照眼科镜片的合规性要求，成品眼镜产品的质量、性能和矫正属性至关重要。

根据欧洲指令 2007/47/EC（原 93/42/EEC），光学镜片被归类为医疗器材。

AI亚检可为光学镜片提供包括尺寸、力学、光学、辐射、老化及其他测试在内的全面实验室测试和质量检测方案。我们的工厂现场审核和获得 HOKLAS 认证的实验室测试能确保您的产品满足目标市场的各类要求，以及符合相应的各类国际标准。

专业的眼镜类产品测试实验室和检验团队

我们具备按照 ISO/IEC 17025 眼镜与眼科产品标准执行测试的资格，可助您确保光学镜片符合可适用的所有国际和国内标准，包括：

  • 国际: ISO 14889、ISO 21986.9
  • 欧洲：EN ISO 14889、EN ISO 21987
  • 美国：ANSI Z80.1
  • 中国：GB 10810（第 1 至 3 节）、GB/T 13511
  • 澳大利亚/新西兰：AS/NZS ISO 14889、AS/NZS ISO 21987

HOKLAS 认证的光学镜片实验室测试

我们专业的眼镜类产品实验室测试提供范围最广的各类测试，可依据相关的所有国际标准对镜片的化学、几何学和光学特性进行检测，包括：

  • 防磨损涂层，标准：ISO/EN ISO/AS/NZS 980-5、GB 10810.5 和 ANSI Z80.1
  • 防反射涂层，标准：ISO/EN ISO/AS/NZS 8980-4、ANSI Z80.1 和 GB 10810.4
  • 驾驶用镜片要求，标准：ISO/EN ISO/AS/NZS 8980-3、ANZI Z80.1 和 GB 10810.3
  • 阻燃性测试，标准：ANSI Z80.1
  • 硬质涂层耐用性，标准：GB 10810.5（增强型抗磨损方法）
  • 镜片涂层耐用性，标准：AS/NZS 2228.1
  • 镜片涂层在化妆品或清洁溶液作用下的稳定性（内部方法）
  • 镜片几何尺寸和厚度公差，标准：ISO/EN ISO/AS/NZS 8980-1、ANSI Z80.1 和 GB 10810.1
  • 镜片机械强度（最小强度），标准：ISO / EN ISO / AS/NZS 14889
  • 镜片定位，标准：ISO/EN ISO/AS/NZS 8980-2、ANSI Z80.2 和 GB 10810.2
  • 镜片抗燃烧，标准：ISO/EN ISO/AS/NZS 14889
  • 镜片表面质量，标准：ISO/EN ISO/AS/NSZ 14889、ISO/EN ISO 8980-1、ANSI Z80.1 和 GB 10810.1
  • 光透射率和透射比，标准：ISO/EN ISO/AS/NZS 8980-3、ANSI Z80.1 和 GB 10810.3
  • 已安装的成副镜片，标准：ISO/EN ISO/AS/NZS 21987 和 ANSI Z80.1
  • 多焦点和双焦点镜片的光学度数及公差，标准：ISO/EN ISO/AS/NZS 8980-1、GB 10810.1 和 ANSI Z80.1
  • 渐进镜片的光学度数及公差，标准：ISO/EN ISO/AS/NZS 8980-2、GB 10810.2 和 ANSI Z80.1
  • 抗极端温度（老化测试）：热稳定性、低温稳定性等
  • 抗光辐射（老化测试，在 450w 氙气灯下测试 25 至 50 小时），标准：ISO/EN ISO/AS/NZS 8980-2、GB 10810.2 和 ANSI Z80.1
  • 抗 UVA/UVB 辐射（老化测试，内部方法）
  • 单光镜片的光学度数及公差，标准：ISO/EN ISO/AS/NZS 8980-1、GB 10810.1 和 ANSI Z80.1

可根据贵公司的规范要求和质量检验流程对测试项目进行客制化定制。请联系我们，我们的专家将针对您的眼镜类产品测试需求立即给出检测方案以及报价。

  • 成品老花镜
  • 时尚太阳镜
  • 滑雪护目镜和特种眼镜
  • 护目镜和防护面罩
